dmca.title: Google wants "Large Maps" hack off the map
dmca.body:
[Private],

The Google Maps team recently noticed your Google Maps tile "poster
maker" at http://web.media.mit.edu/~nvawter/projects/googlemaps/.
Google is always happy to see developers interested in our products
and we commend you on the service.  That said, we would appreciate it
if you voluntarily remove the tile-downloading programs from your web
site. The programs violate the Maps Terms of Service available at
http://www.google.com/help/terms_local.html, and jeopardize our
ability to make Google Maps available to the public because they
encourage mass downloading of our copyrighted images and data.

If you are interested in legally developing with Google Maps, check
out our new Google Maps API at http://www.google.com/apis/maps/.

If you have any questions or concerns, or if we have contacted the
wrong person, please feel free to contact me directly.  Otherwise,
please let us know as soon as possible when the service has been
removed.

Thanks,
[Private]
Product Manager, Google Maps
